00056 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadDATWithGenericReaderTest()
00057 {
00058         GenericFileReader reader;
00059         GenericData data;
00060 
00061         reader.SetFilename("../data/DAT_file");
00062         reader.ReadHeader(data);
00063 
00064         int dataGroups = data.DataGroupCnt();
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataGroups == 1);
00066 
00067         int dataSets = data.DataSetCnt(0);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataSets == 2);
00069 
00070         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pixels = data.DataSet(0, 0);
00071         if(pixels->Open())
00072         {
00073                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00074                 int r = pixels->Rows();
00075                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r == 10);
00076                 int c = pixels->Cols();
00077                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c == 1);
00078                 int16_t pix1;
00079                 pixels->GetData(0, 0, pix1);
00080                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pix1 == 36);
00081                 int16_t pix2;
00082                 pixels->GetData(1, 0, pix2);
00083                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pix2 == 3);
00084         }
00085         else
00086         {
00087                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00088         }
00089         pixels->Delete();
00090 
00091         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* stats = data.DataSet(0, 1);
00092         if(stats->Open())
00093         {
00094                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00095                 int r = stats->Rows();
00096                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r == 1);
00097                 int c = stats->Cols();
00098                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c == 2);
00099                 int16_t s1;
00100                 stats->GetData(0, 0, s1);
00101                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == 16);
00102                 int16_t s2;
00103                 stats->GetData(0, 1, s2);
00104                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == 22);
00105         }
00106         else
00107         {
00108                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00109         }
00110         stats->Delete();
00111 }
00112 
00113 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileTest()
00114 {
00115         DATData data;
00116         DATFileReader reader;
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE));
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00119 
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00127         DateTime dt = data.GetScanDate();
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.ToString() == L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00129 
00130         u_int32_t pixelCnt = data.GetRows()*data.GetCols();
00131         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00132         for (u_int16_t i=0; i<pixelCnt; ++i)
00133                 expectedPixels[i] = i+10;
00134 
00135         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixels(pixels, 0, data.GetRows()));
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*data.GetRows()*data.GetCols()) == 0);
00138 
00139         u_int16_t min, max;
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRange(min, max));
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == pixels[0]);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == pixels[pixelCnt-1]);
00143 
00144         delete [] expectedPixels;
00145         delete [] pixels;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileWithSubgridsTest()
00149 {
00150         DATData data;
00151         DATFileReader reader;
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS));
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00154 
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS);
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00162         DateTime dt = data.GetScanDate();
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.ToString() == L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00164 
00165         u_int32_t pixelCnt = data.GetRows()*data.GetCols();
00166         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00167         for (u_int16_t i=0; i<pixelCnt; ++i)
00168                 expectedPixels[i] = i+10;
00169 
00170         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixels(pixels, 0, data.GetRows()));
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*data.GetRows()*data.GetCols()) == 0);
00173 
00174         u_int16_t min, max;
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRange(min, max));
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == pixels[0]);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == pixels[pixelCnt-1]);
00178 
00179         delete [] expectedPixels;
00180         delete [] pixels;
00181 
00182         // Compute the expected grid
00183         float increment = 2.5f;
00184         FRegion ggRegion;
00185         float ptVal = 0.0;
00186         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00187         {
00188                 FPoint point;
00189                 point.x = ptVal;
00190                 ptVal += increment;
00191                 point.y = ptVal;
00192                 ggRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00193         }
00194         u_int32_t ggStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00195 
00196         // Check the grid
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGrid() == ggRegion);
00198         // Check the status
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGridStatus() == ggStatus);
00200 
00201         int32_t subgridCnt = 10;
00202 
00203         // Compute the expected subgrids
00204         for(int n = 0; n < subgridCnt; n++)
00205         {
00206                 FRegion expectedSGRegion;
00207                 float ptVal = 0.0f + (float)n;
00208                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00209                 {
00210                         FPoint point;
00211                         point.x = ptVal;
00212                         ptVal += increment;
00213                         point.y = ptVal;
00214                         expectedSGRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 u_int32_t sgStatus = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00218                 if (n % 2 == 0)
00219                         sgStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00220 
00221                 FRegion sgRegion = data.GetSubgrid(n);
00222 
00223                 // Check the subgrid
00224                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgRegion == expectedSGRegion);
00225                 // Check the status
00226                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgStatus == data.GetSubgridStatus(n));
00227         }
00228 
00229 }
00230 
00231 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileWithSubgridsUsingSmallMemoryFootprintTest()
00232 {
00233         DATData data;
00234         DATFileReader reader;
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS));
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00237 
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS);
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00245         DateTime dt = data.GetScanDate();
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.ToString() == L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00247 
00248         // Compute the expected results for the full image
00249         u_int32_t fullImagePixelCnt = data.GetRows()*data.GetCols();
00250         u_int16_t* expectedPixelsForFullImage = new u_int16_t[fullImagePixelCnt];
00251         for (u_int16_t i=0; i<fullImagePixelCnt; ++i)
00252                 expectedPixelsForFullImage[i] = i+10;
00253 
00254         // Copy a 2 by 3 region of the expected results.
00255         u_int16_t i=0;
00256         u_int32_t pixelCnt = 2 * 3; // rows * cols
00257         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00258         for (u_int16_t irow = 1; irow < 3; ++irow)
00259                 for (u_int16_t icol = 2; icol < 5; ++icol, ++i)
00260                         expectedPixels[i] = expectedPixelsForFullImage[irow*data.GetCols() + icol];
00261 
00262         // Retrieve a 2 by 3 region of the 4 by 5 image
00263         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00264         data.GetPixels(pixels, 1, 2, 2, 3);
00265         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixels(pixels, 1, 2, 2, 3));
00266         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*pixelCnt) == 0);
00267 
00268         u_int16_t min, max;
00269         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRange(min, max));
00270         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == expectedPixelsForFullImage[0]);
00271         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == expectedPixelsForFullImage[fullImagePixelCnt-1]);
00272 
00273         delete [] expectedPixelsForFullImage;
00274         delete [] expectedPixels;
00275         delete [] pixels;
00276 
00277         // Compute the expected grid
00278         float increment = 2.5f;
00279         FRegion ggRegion;
00280         float ptVal = 0.0;
00281         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00282         {
00283                 FPoint point;
00284                 point.x = ptVal;
00285                 ptVal += increment;
00286                 point.y = ptVal;
00287                 ggRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00288         }
00289         u_int32_t ggStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00290 
00291         // Check the grid
00292         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGrid() == ggRegion);
00293         // Check the status
00294         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGridStatus() == ggStatus);
00295 
00296         int32_t subgridCnt = 10;
00297 
00298         // Compute the expected subgrids
00299         for(int n = 0; n < subgridCnt; n++)
00300         {
00301                 FRegion expectedSGRegion;
00302                 float ptVal = 0.0f + (float)n;
00303                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00304                 {
00305                         FPoint point;
00306                         point.x = ptVal;
00307                         ptVal += increment;
00308                         point.y = ptVal;
00309                         expectedSGRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00310                 }
00311 
00312                 u_int32_t sgStatus = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00313                 if (n % 2 == 0)
00314                         sgStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00315 
00316                 FRegion sgRegion = data.GetSubgrid(n);
00317 
00318                 // Check the subgrid
00319                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgRegion == expectedSGRegion);
00320                 // Check the status
00321                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgStatus == data.GetSubgridStatus(n));
00322         }
00323 }

00325 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileWithGridParametersTest()
00326 {
00327         DATData data;
00328         DATFileReader reader;
00329         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS_AND_PARAMETERS));
00330         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00331 
00332         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS_AND_PARAMETERS);
00333         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00334         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00335 
00336         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00337         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00338         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00339         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00340         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(L"County", nvt));
00341         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueText() == L"Santa Clara");
00342         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params[0].GetName() == L"Zip Code");
00343         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params[0].GetValueInt32() == 95051);
00344 }
